thread.title: Advanced Data Systems Corp. Reports Success on ICD-10
thread.title_full: Advanced Data Systems Corp. Reports Success on ICD-10

title: Advanced Data Systems Corp. Reports Success on ICD-10
text:
RSS Navigation Links HOME >> MEDICINE >> TECHNOLOGY Advanced Data Systems Corp. Reports Success on ICD-10 ... PARAMUS N.J. Oct. 22 2015 /-...This applies to ADS clients who use their Medics systems directly eith... David Barzillai President of ADS said ...Contact ADS at 800-899-4237 or by emailing a href mailto:info@adsc.c... http://feeds.bio-medicine.org/latest-medical-technology Date:10/22/2015 
PARAMUS, N.J. ,   -- Advanced Data Systems Corp. ( ADS ) is pleased to announce that with almost one million ICD-10 claims submitted by its clients since October 1, their 99% success rate on first attempt clearinghouse claims prior to ICD-10 essentially remains constant, post-ICD-10. 
This applies to ADS clients who use their Medics systems directly either as cloud / ASP or in client server format, and for those using ADS' MedicsRCM services. 
David Barzillai , President of ADS, said, "ADS was ready for ICD-10 from its first deadline date of October, 2013. Now that ICD-10 is here, it has basically shown itself to be a non-event for our clients, which is excellent. "This has no doubt been helped by the educational tools made available to our clients including webinars, videos, and live support on using their Medics systems for ICD-10, and by our systems' own built-in ICD-10 coding tools. We fully expect calendar year 2015 to end the same way for our clients as did 2014: with no less than a 99% success rate on their first attempt clearinghouse claims," Mr. Barzillai added. 
Contact ADS at 800-899-4237 or by emailing info@adsc.com for more information on its ICD-10 compliant systems which include interesting capabilities designed to empower practices to obtain every dollar for every patient and service. These capabilities include features for handling purchasable products and non-medical services, for complying with a host of incentivized, revenue-producing CMS initiatives, for managing and reporting on clinical trials which can produce very significant income to practices, and more. 
About Advanced Data Systems: ADS is a leading provider of interoperable automation solutions to medical practices, enterprise organizations, imaging centers, behavioral health facilities, and to revenue cycle management companies. The Medics Suite from ADS includes MedicsDocAssistant™, certified as a complete EHR for Stage 2 Meaningful Use, MedicsPremier™ and MedicsElite™ for comprehensive practice management , and MedicsRIS™ specifically for radiology practices. MedicsRCM™ is available for practices that prefer to outsource their RCM services. The Medics Suite is integrated as a unified solution or can be obtained separately per the needs of the practice. They can be utilized Cloud / ASP or customer hosted (client server) format. ADS provides quick Implementation, comprehensive Training and excellent ongoing Support with Updates. Thousands of providers rely on solutions from ADS.
